Import data

```{r}
library(haven)
airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)

airline
```


data wrangling

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(airline) +
 aes(x = Y) +
 geom_histogram(bins = 30L, fill = "#0c4c8a") +
 theme_minimal()

```
